blur_detection.description: The receipt exhibits good sharpness with clear, readable text throughout the document.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text clarity is sufficient for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt shows excellent contrast between the black text and white background.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvement needed for contrast as text is highly readable.

glare_identification.description: No significant glare or reflections are present on the receipt surface.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action required as the image is free from glare issues.

water_stains.description: No water damage, staining or discoloration is visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No remediation needed as the document appears dry and undamaged by liquids.

tears_or_folds.description: Minor creasing is visible at the top of the receipt but does not affect text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed as the minor creasing doesn't impact data extraction.

cut_off_detection.description: The receipt appears to be fully captured within the frame with all content visible.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No action needed as all receipt content is properly framed.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with header, line items, subtotals, and final total all visible.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as all standard receipt sections are present.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows or other obstructions are covering any part of the receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: No action required as the image is free from obstructions.
